p_str: SELECT T3.location FROM station_company AS T1 JOIN company AS T2 ON T1.company_id  =  T2.company_id JOIN gas_station AS T3 ON T1.station_id  =  T3.station_id WHERE T2.market_1  >  100
g_str: SELECT T3.location FROM station_company AS T1 JOIN company AS T2 ON T1.company_id  =  T2.company_id JOIN gas_station AS T3 ON T1.station_id  =  T3.station_id WHERE T2.market_value  >  100
